Author: ManashM
Summary: Normally using default PS script the VM deletion is not a clean deletion as that not delete many resources for example O/S disk, data disk & NIC card. This script provide an way to do a clean deletion.Example1 If the need is to delete multiple VM, Log, VERBOSE: Removing VM
Title: Clean Azure VM Deletion
UserTags: Clean Azure Rm VM Deletion, Delete Azure Rm VM with Disks
